moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Escalate Golden Ticket
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will create a Golden Kerberos Ticket using the Mimikatz Kiwi Extension. If no
        options are applied it will attempt to identify the current domain, the domain administrator
        account, the target domain SID, and retrieve the krbtgt NTLM hash from the database. By default
        the well-known Administrator's groups 512, 513, 518, 519, and 520 will be applied to the ticket.
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: USE
options.description: Use the ticket in the current session

options.name: END_IN
options.description: End in ... Duration in hours, default 10 YEARS (~87608 hours)
